description: Gets information about the Device Defender audit settings for this account. Settings include how audit notifications are sent and which audit checks are enabled or disabled. Requires permission to access the DescribeAccountAuditConfiguration action.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to IoT to access information about your devices, policies, certificates, and other items as required when performing an audit.

nested_items.name: auditNotificationTargetConfigurations
nested_items.description: Information about the targets to which audit notifications are sent for this account.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target (SNS topic) to which audit notifications are sent.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to send notifications to the target.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: True if notifications to the target are enabled.

nested_items.name: auditCheckConfigurations
nested_items.description: Which audit checks are enabled and disabled for this account.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: True if this audit check is enabled for this account.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: A structure containing the configName and corresponding configValue for configuring audit checks.
